title: Gotham with curves?
content: I love classic look of Gotham Black in all-caps, but it can be a little plain. Is there anything similar with some subtle hints of individuality? Maybe, as just one idea, some subtle curves where serifs might otherwise be?
author: pdxuser

comments.content:
have to looked at:

Effra: [http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/effra](http://web.archive.org/web/20090819081410/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/effra "http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/effra")

Corpid: [http://www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/corpid/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090819081410/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/corpid/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/corpid/")

Alright Sans: [http://okaytype.com/Typefaces/Alright\_Sans/Overview/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20090819081410/http:/okaytype.com/Typefaces/Alright_Sans/Overview/index.php "http://okaytype.com/Typefaces/Alright\_Sans/Overview/index.php")
